com.eyecall.connection

Interface ProtocolHandler<E extends State>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - State type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultProtocolHandler, DummyVIPProtocolHandler, DummyVolunteerProtocolHandler, ServerProtocolHandler, StatelessProtocolHandler, TestProtocolHandler, TestProtocolHandler, VIPProtocolHandler, VolunteerProtocolHandler

    public interface ProtocolHandler<E extends State>
    This interface handles incoming messages from a Connection. While handling a Message, a ProtocolHandler can add messages to the OutQueue. A ProtocolHandler obtains the current state of the Connection and can change the Connection's state by returning a different state.
    Author:
    Nicker

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • messageSent

        State messageSent(E state,
                Message m)
        handles an incoming message.
        Parameters:
        state - Connection's current state
        m - incoming message
        queue - message queue. Messages added to this queue will be sent to the sender of this incoming message
        Returns:
        the new state the Connection should have. Return null to let the DefaultProtocolHandler handle this message.
